posts.post_title: FS: t206s all SGC graded, consolidated list
posts.post_content:
For sale ~ combined lists of cards with price reductions.

Will consider offers as well, I like to think I am pretty reasonable...

Check, MO or paypal gift

email only please for scan requests and purchases.

thanks - Rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]
